ygData.subject: RE: days played (bit off topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you tell me how you think you made it so fast. IS it because you only attacked gambles or do some MOBs give better experience? ... From: Ilkka
ygData.messageBody:
Can you tell me how you think you made it so fast. IS it because you only
attacked "gambles" or do some MOBs give better experience?

-----Original Message-----
From: Ilkka Salmenkaita [mailto:isalmen@...]
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 10:04 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] days played (bit off topic)


From: "Ilkka Salmenkaita" <isalmen@...>

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
> Talking about days played, this reminds me of the discussion we had
> on here a while back about twinking a character to level 20. Someone
> mentioned that it could be done in 10 game days. Others believed
> that that would be nearly impossible.

Hmmh well, I am a powergamer (I like it to optimize things to their full
extent). I have a character on a mud with which I made top player in 1week
1day, while the others below me were over 3weeks of age. Mind you,
most players in that mud were powerplayers, it was no chat/roleplay
mud. After initial adjustation to the graphical setting, navigating,
general usage of everything etc., one 14th char on Erollisi Marr
(under 5days), general fooling around with a few classes that
sounded interesting I finally started on the fresh Quellious with my main
char of now. At the moment, I am 22nd level with under 5days
of age. And this also includes probably at least closer to day of
exploring and general fooling around with new places. Also,
I am quite sure I could shave quite a bit of time from the progress
if I started again. Exp gathered in groups instead of soloing
is probably under 10%. And no twinking (how could I? =)),
no guild help (haven't got any) and solo most of the time.
Been to Cazic, Unrest, Perma, visited Mistmoore, CBone
BBurrow. Been in all 3 continents, but mostly on Antonica.
I just hate Faydwer =) And class was bard, not necro or
magician or druid, the so-called powergamer classes.
Haven't tried any of those btw, so don't know for sure if I
could optimize them to go any faster. I seriously doubt
that any class can level 14-20 faster than a bard though.

After the rambling if you are still reading, I can just say that
if you are _twinking_ a character, I would guess the time it
takes to go to 20th level is (take calculator) ... I would
guestimate under 2days of played time. Calculating in also
guild help power-leveling. Probably closer to 1d than 2d.
Don't like the figures, blame someone else than me =)
And if some guild has actually powerleveled a guy to 20th
and resulted with longer time than 2days, that guild needs
someone able to powerplay ;)

- Ilkka Salmenkaita, isalmen@...
